ns2:workflow.description: Runs an SSH command on salt master

param.name: hostNameOrIP
param.description: Hostname or IP address of the SSH host

param.name: passwordAuthentication
param.description: Sets authentication to password or key file

param.name: encoding
param.description: The encoding to be used. Leave this field empty to use the default system encoding. (Example values: "UTF-8", "ISO-8859-1"...)

param.name: result
param.description: 0 = OK, Negative = Error, Positive = Number of values returned, after error text

param.name: outputText
param.description: Result of running the SSH command

attrib.name: defaultKeyPairPath
attrib.description: Default path to the key file

attrib.name: exitCode
attrib.description: Returns 0 if successful, and a negative value if there is a failure
